page.title: 01General Information
page.content: Most of the area is {grazing land}or {woodland.}The trees are a mixture of coniferous and deciduous. There are a few farm {houses}scattered around.Most of the other{houses }are in the south-east corner. The area has got quite a lot of {foot {paths}.Most of the {roads }are very {narrow }and there are a lot of {sharp {bends }.On top of the hills there are a lot of {pleasant views}and on some you can see the {River Severn.}There are quite a few {streams or brooks {going}through the forest and under the roads. The only amenity is {Hewelsfield {Church}which is hidden in a hollow.
